member.name: IWICImageEncoder.WriteFrame
member.summary: Encodes the image to the frame given by the IWICBitmapFrameEncode.
member.param: The Direct2D image that will be encoded.
The frame encoder to which the image is written.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICImageEncoder.WriteFrameThumbnail
member.summary: Encodes the image as a thumbnail to the frame given by the IWICBitmapFrameEncode.
member.param: The Direct2D image that will be encoded.
The frame encoder on which the thumbnail is set.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICImageEncoder.WriteThumbnail
member.summary: Encodes the given image as the thumbnail to the given WIC bitmap encoder.
member.param: The Direct2D image that will be encoded.
The encoder on which the thumbnail is set.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICImageEncoder
member.summary: Encodes interfaces to an IWICBitmapEncoder. The input images can be larger than the maximum device texture size.
